nodes.text: The Rodmark Weapons Plant was a weapons factory in the industrial zone of Iskaayuma, on Rodia. It was a stronghold of the Roolek clan, most of whom had fled Rodia after Navik the Red ordered his Chattza Protectors to hunt them down.

The bounty hunter Inntak hired a group of mercenaries to hunt down a group of Rooleks, who were attending a show of the Rodian Galactic Drama Troupe. The mercenaries followed the Rooleks to the factory, where around 100 Rodians were working. It is unclear what happened next; the mercenaries either attacked, or sneaked away to pass on the information of the clan's whereabout to Inntak.
